guideline.name: FDA PGx Association [Pharmacogenetic Associations for which the Data Support Therapeutic Management Recommendations]: Brivaracetam - CYP2C19

relatedGenes.name: cytochrome P450 family 2 subfamily C member 19

recommendations.name: Recommendation Annotation PA166310382
recommendations.population: Affected subgroup: CYP2C19 intermediate or poor metabolizers

text.html: "Results in higher systemic concentrations and higher adverse reaction risk. Consider dosage reductions in poor metabolizers."
